derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Middle Low German sledde; related to the verb slide

entry.def: A sled is the same as a sledge .
If you go sledding, you ride on a sled.

example.ex: We got home and went sledding on the small hill in our back yard.
example.tran: 我们回到家里，然后去后院的小山上滑雪橇。

means.word_mean: 1. a vehicle mounted on runners and pulled by horses or dogs; for transportation over snow
